sect2.title: Installation of GPM
sect2.para: Install GPM by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-segfault.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../gpm-1.20.1-silent.patch && LDFLAGS="-lm" ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc && make && make install && cp conf/gpm-root.conf /etc && ldconfig -n -l /usr/lib/libgpm.so.1.19.0
